MEET THE JELLYS! – Check us out on Facebook for all the latest news, info and fantastic competitions!

BUG BASH! – Thanks to your fantastic reviews and ratings, we’ve managed to find and squash a few niggly little bugs. Keep those comments coming!

Time to Shine - Check out our awesome new SUPER JELLY TOURNAMENT. Create the most Super Jellys during the tournament to win amazing prizes.

The first tournament will run from July 24th to July 27th. This is your chance to prove that you are the ult

Time to Shine - Check out our awesome new SUPER JELLY TOURNAMENT. Create the most Super Jellys during the tournament to win amazing prizes.

Remember, a line of seven Jellys guarantees a Super Jelly!

The Jellys are celebrating their 4th birthday, come and join the party!

We’ve got NEW LEVELS, an awesome SPLASH BONUS event, and the biggest and best SUPER JELLY COLLECTION event ever!

BUG BASH! – Thanks to your fantastic reviews and ratings, we’ve managed to find and squash a few niggly little bugs. Keep those comments coming!

LEVEL UP - We’ve got a whole bunch of awesome new levels. Have you got the skills needed to beat them?

NEW SCHEDULE - You wanted it, you got it! Get ready for midweek trips up the Ancient Tower, while competition heats up with the Super Jelly Tourn

LEAGUES HAVE ARRIVED - Tournaments have just got an upgrade. Win tournaments and rise through the different leagues. Can you get the ultimate achievement of Diamond?

SPLASHY VALENTINE – The Jellys love you! To say thanks for being such a wonderful friend, the Jellys have set up a sweet Valentine’s Day sale with discounts on everything but love!

PRETTY IN PINK – The Jellys have gone super romantic this Valentine

JELLICIOUS WEEKENDS – Make every weekend a splashtastic one with the awesome ANCIENT JELLY TOWER! Complete 10 tower levels every Friday to Sunday and win fantastic prizes!

MEET THE JELLYS! – Check us out on Facebook for all the latest news, info and fantastic competitions!
BUG BASH! – Thanks to your fantastic reviews and ratings, we’ve managed to find and squash a few niggly little bugs. Keep those comments coming!

SPLASH-TASTIC - We are working hard on improving the game with new content and bug fixes. Download the latest version to keep up to date with the Jellys!

NEW PRIVACY POLICY: We have updated our Privacy Policy and it is now available for you to view
YOU’RE THE BEST – Thanks so much for all your feedback, comments and ratings. They really help us, so please keep them coming!
YOU’RE AMAZING – Your feedback helped us spot an irritating bug, so thanks for pointing it out. It’s all fixed now, and you can carry on with your Jellyventure!

HOT JELLY! – Phew! We put all our efforts into fixing that irritating bug from the last release. Sorry about that one. Must’ve been the Jellys playing around again.
YOU’RE THE BEST – Thanks so much for all your feedback, comments and ratings. They really help us, so please keep them coming!
JELLICIOUS! – What a pickle! Some of those sneaky slimes have snuck in a few icky bugs. Don’t worry, though, the Jellys have sorted it, so be sure to update and enjoy bug-free splashing.
